lead_paragraph: Ferrari’s Felipe Massa won his third race of the year and his second consecutive Turkish Grand Prix by beating his teammate Kimi Raikkonen yesterday in Istanbul. Fernando Alonso of McLaren was third. The overall leader, Lewis Hamilton of McLaren, finished fifth.
